leve.name: Mortarin'
leve.description: The nobles of the High Houses have expressed concern that should the dragons attack again, their homes would not be properly reinforced to take the damage, leaving their manors to serve as their tombs. As per their demands, I would have you travel to the Sea of Clouds and mine slabs of pumice, light material yet strong enough to reinforce the walls of noble homes.
leve.client: Temple Knights Second Commander Ser Handeloup
